caption: The video is divided into three parts. In the first, a bald man and a woman have a heart-to-heart conversation inside a house where the woman, looking at pictures on the wall, seems to be reminiscing about past sorrows. The second part of the video shows a group arriving at a secretive internet caf√©, whose owner appears to be a black market dealer and drug smuggler. One of the group, Chen, experiences hallucinations after eating the owner's bread, while two others get into a fight inside the shop over some issue, escalating to a physical altercation, ending with the owner kicking them all out. In the final part of the video, two women find themselves strapped to an operating table in a laboratory, but they manage to escape on their own. As they are about to leave the laboratory, they get entangled in a fierce hand-to-hand combat due to some personal vendetta.
